item.title: Knowledge of Science and Technology Platform
item.description:
Sponsor: Korea Institute of Science and Technology Information (KISTI)

Period: Jan 2006 - Dec 2006

Tasks:

  • Construction of Lexical Semantic Network for Words of General and IT Category
  • Category Tagging on Thesaurus

Description and contributions

In this project, I have contributed to construct lexical semantic hierarchy for general and IT hierarchical categories from about 40,000 words with three other team members who tagged the thesaurus together.
